content.detailedDescription: I was walking kind of aimlessly around 8:10 pm, heard a loud buzzing behind me and though someone on a mophead or something was behind me. the thing was bright red and green and i'm not sure of it was completely square or not but was squarish and zoomed past my head way up in the sky going very quickly. i knew immediately that it was something strange and stopped and stared. it went one block down then took a sharp left , went about half a block, took another sharp left and came back to about three houses down from where i was standing. it tilted downwards as if it were looking at me and lights went off and i only saw it to be a dark color ( it was night) then hovered for about a full minute, then started descending and when it seemed like it got to the rooftop it just completely disappeared.  i was very freaked out and immediately started googling pictures of ufos to see if i could find anything similar. this is the weirdest thing that has ever happened to me. my boyfriend came out while it was descending and hovering so he saw as well.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went straight over head, loud buzzing, made sudden left, another sudden left, came back within 30 ft of where i was, hovered and descended, then completely disappeared!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I and co-worker/friend, were working late outside on a time sensitive project to meet a deadline.  at 2:47 am we decided to stop working and my friend was getting ready to leave.  there were no clouds and no breeze at this time.  from the south we saw what appeared to be fire in the sky approaching us.  we ran 20-30 feet towards the east to see it better as a tree was in the way. then i saw it was approaching us and felt we were looking at the bottom.  it's shape was a horseshoe crab but with the top end shorter than the bottom.  white fire was coming out the back with a very long orange fire trail and many streaks of orange objects flying from the fire trail.  the trail was 3 to 4 times longer than the object.  the object was as big as our hand and approximately 1-3 miles away.  we saw the object for 25 seconds clearly and i tried to count the number of lights or illumination of light on the front end which was 80-100.  as i then noticed a grid pattern rectangular shape in the center of the object i hollered to  "how big is the grid? and how many lights do you see?  is it 200 or more?"  my friend was focused on the fire trail and hollered 3 times "it is crashing!"  no i hollered "no it is not crashing it is now leaving" and headed east until it disappeared from view in 30 seconds. the altitude never changed.  it moved 5 times or more faster than any aircraft known to me and was so much larger.  there was no sound emitted but we hollered in our excitement. we were were acting unusually excited for a good hour.  running, looking for more, talking what was that?  i could not sleep for a week and was worried for my health and could not focus on my work.  my friend felt this changed his whole outlook on mankind and who we are.  this was one of the greatest experiences of my life comparing it to my children being born.  i can not get this experience out of my mind. the next morning my friend came back to my home and we discussed what we experienced again.  my friend originally didn't want to tell anyone until a neighbor stopped by and we shared our experience.  she being an artist had me draw a picture of what i saw.  then asked my friend to also draw what he saw-separately.  the pictures were the same.
content.summary: Large horseshoe crab shape, dull grey with lights and orange fire tail (fuel?) no sound. stunning 25 seconds 2 observers

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of valentine's day i and four others witnessed a flying object that glowed like a star. it was my female cousin, male cousin, my brother and i. we were walking up 160th st. in washington heights. my aunts apartment is halfway up the block between broadway and amsterdam. when we got to the front of the building my female cousin spotted the object over the roof line of the school up the block. we were not sure of what it was at first. we thought it was either a plane, helicopter, star or moon. we mentioned it all. then i noticed the intensity of the lights, the shape of the object, and the way it moved in the sky and determined that it was none of these things we thought of. i saw it so clearly for a few seconds. it appeared to be spinning but i could also notice some patterns on its edges. i then decide to record it. i have to admit, after watching the video i can tell you that the images do the sighting no justice. it was clearer with the naked eye. but i decided to record it for proof that this thing was there and not to prove what it was. i still don't know what it was.
my female cousin was very nervous and thought that the object could somehow land on us, but i knew that even if this thing crashed we were at least a mile away. the object move over the roof line horizontally and vertically. at one point it descended out of our sight behind the rooftop of the building. i then moved to the top of the front stoop to gain height and re-spotted the object. i saw it move for a few seconds and then it descended further out of sight. at this point we all decided to run up to our building's rooftop to get even higher off the ground in hope to capture it on video again. when we reached the top of our building we saw the object again. it was hovering in one spot and then it started to ascend. then it moved to our right. then it appeared to move in our direction slightly. that is when i saw a glare of pure white light with a tint of blue. i have seen something similar to to this glare on the hid lights of some cars. we observed the object move in a straight line to our right and then back to the left. it ascended and hovered and then descended behind the same building it was flying over. there were many things that helped distinguish   
this object over its surroundings. the clouds, lights on top of buildings, airplanes flying by, background city noise, even airplane engine noise. this thing made no sounds that we were able to pick up. i hope that you can help us explain what it was. we thought to call the police to report it but that would have required to use my our phones. none of us wanted to do that for fear of missing out in recording it. i realized after the fact that one of our companion at our roof top was a person that was not with us at the time we spotted it downstairs. this kid recorded it also. my brother asked if he could use his phone to report it but this kid said his phone was low in battery. when the object did not reappeared we left the roof top. we never reported it. i thought fro certain that someone else somewhere else had to have seen this and immediately started to search for online reports of it. i was unable to find anything about this event so far but i have posted it on my facebook and on youtube. after seeing this the reaction has been mixed for me. i know that it was not something i have seen before. i know that nothing i have seen before can move so quickly or can be so bright. this thing moved as if it had independence and will. i live near newark airport and a smaller airport where there are news helicopters. i know what this things look like in daylight and at night. this object was neither of those. of course, my question remains the same. what was it?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On night of valentines day i and few others witnessed an object flying over building.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 7:45 pm when my dogs wanted to go outside. i told them that this was their "last call" for the night. when i opened the doors to let them out i noticed how quiet it was outside, no traffic sounds and no wind blowing. as the dogs ran out of the house i saw a large orange ball in the sky moving for north to south in a straight line.I first noticed the orange ball through my backyard tree, which is on the east side of my home. it continued to move over the golf course and disappeared about where the lake on the golf course would have been. i watched it for about a minute before it just disappeared. after it disappeared the dogs wanted to come back inside.

at first i thought it was a sky lantern, but based on the size of the glowing ball it would have had to be a size that would be impossible to lift off the ground.

it didn't bother me to see something like that, i wasn't upset in any way. i became very tired and went to bed at around 9:10 p.M. i awoke at 1:15 a.M. feeling very anxious, for no obvious reason. i got up and went downstairs for a glass of water. that is when i noticed that one of the dogs was on the stair landing not sleeping, and the other one was at the foot of my bed, not sleeping.
content.summary: A large orange glowing ball.

content.detailedDescription: My friend brittany, my dog and i took our tripods and dslr cameras and decided to take a walk around 7:15pm and take some pictures of the night sky over the belknap range. we arrived at our destination at about 7:25pm, set up our tripods and started snapping long exposure pictures at about 7:30pm. i saw the lights in the first picture i took but it was a bit blurry, so i focused on the lights of the house and took another picture. it took about 15 seconds to take the second picture, i could not see the lights clearly because they were behind the clouds but the shutter speed on my camera can pick up stars behind the clouds so i believe the ufo was behind the clouds hovering. i took a third picture and that took another 15 seconds and the green lights were still hovering in the clouds. without changing my settings i took a fourth picture and the lights were completely gone. the whole craft hovered for about 45 seconds unless it had hovered before we got there. if it was a flare from the lens i believe it would have showed up in the fourth picture since i did not change positions or any settings on the camera. during this whole duration my dog was constantly growling very low and quiet looking at the sky. i felt excitement and my friend felt worried. i did not show her the pictures until we got home unless she could sense something unusual.
content.summary: Took some pictures of strange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home around 3:15 am in lewisville going west on valley ridge. i had just crossed over gardern ridge  and was about to turn on my street to go home and i saw an object in the sky and then disappear. the object was black and round, it had a green glow around it and a white light trailing it. it was moving very quickly south west and dissapeared. was only visible for a short amount of time. at first i thought it was a shooting star. but it was way to big to be one of those, and the green glow around it was kind of strange
content.summary: Bright light appears and disappears 2/13/2014 lewisville tx

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking my dog and he was looking up and so i saw an object in sky.
then i heard a humming or buzzing like sound.I kept watching and the object
made a sharp turn to my left and quickly disappeared.The craft was long
between one hundred to three hundred ft long.There was some windows down
the sides but i was unable to see if there was a cockpit.
content.summary: I heard a buzzing sound while walking my dog,looked up and saw an object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in my car at 2225 on 2-16-14 on my way to work. i was coming down a hill and off in the distance (ssw, by the compass, not relative to my car's position) i saw a very large light through the trees. it may have been one large oval light or an oval shape with lights on it. i did see divisions of light and dark, but that also may have been the effect of a solid light seen through trees. at first, i thought it was a super moon because that was the only logical explanation for a light that size in that direction. then i glanced to my left to see the moon and knew that this light was clearly something else. as i stated earlier, i was driving down a hill; when i reached the bottom, i could no longer see the light. i turned onto a different road, driving away from the light but i kept watch in my rear view mirror and side mirrors to see if i could spot the source of the light again, but i couldn't.

i began to run through the various things it could have been. it was the wrong position for the moon. it was too low and well lit to be a known aircraft. it couldn't be a cluster of stars for various reasons. there are no houses in the area that i would be able to see from there. i drive this route to work at about this same time 4 days a week, so i'm familiar with what would be regular activity. honestly, i don't know what i saw. it appeared to be a lit oval shape behind trees that either hovered, descended, or disappeared but because my car was descending a hill, i lost sight of it. i do not feel confident enough in what i saw to definitively call it a sighting. i am submitting this report more so to validate other reports of the same incident should they be made.
content.summary: A large light in the sky obscured by trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work, around 5:45 pm, on monday, feb 10th. i was on the 5 fwy heading north near la county/usc hospital when i first noticed the object. i thought it was an airplane. 

as i kept driving north towards glendale on the 5 fwy, i noticed how the object was completely lit. like a light bulb glowing against the dusk sky. the object was completely lit, like a glow in the dark sticker, but not green, instead it was white. but it did not radiate light, like a flash light. by now it was around 6 pm and i was driving near dodger stadium. by then the object was traveling my way and it seemed to glide in the sky. perfectly gliding. as i drove towards it, i noticed it looked a little bit like a football shape, and like i said, the whole object was glowing like a glow in the dark, white color sticker. by then i could definitely tell it was not an airplane, nor helicopter and not a blimp or a chinese lantern or a kite or a remote control toy. 

as i drove, the object was on the other side of the 5 fwy near i would say the atwater village area. then, the object stopped and hovered over a building. there are lots of factories around there, near the la river area. the object was hovering i would say no higher than a 40 story building. then, it appeared to freeze in the air. it was perfectly still. it was amazing. i rolled down the window and i could not hear a sound. note: i was on the freeway but it was congested. i was traveling no more than 5-10 m/p/h and that's why i was able to see it for so long. another thing, this was the closest i got to it and i would say that the object now resembled a saturn shape. but the edges were kind of fuzzy. also, i noticed a small red light on the bottom of it, that pulsated every few seconds. so maybe it was a drone? i am pretty sure the object was the size of a mid sized car.

i've lived in the burbank/glendale area all my life, i've seen lots and lots of airplanes, helicopters, blimps, toy airplanes. but this was not one of those. it turns your life upside down when you see stuff like this. i am surprised more people didn't see it. i wanted to film it but i was afraid i might crash if i tried to film it with my smart phone. like i said, the glow of it and the way it seemed to literally freeze in the air was amazing. i feel very lucky to have seen one if it turns out to be a ufo.
content.summary: Glowing ufo near 5 fwy, near dodger stadium.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing a lot of things in the sky recently in winston-salem. i have had 5 sightings since i moved here. i don't even tell my family any more because it's pointless- today i saw two jets flying at what looked to be the same altitude almost as if one was following the other. so i looked to the right of the jets and a i see an object that looks just like the jet but with a bright white glow, and no jet stream. (i have the 2 jets and airplane on video but havent yet seen the object) i thought it was a satellite with the sun reflecting off of it (the sun was coming down) but it looked just like the two jets. i continued to watch the jets go across the sky and i began to realize that it seemed the object,  i thought was a satellite, was following behind the two jets. i looked down at my camera to see if it was picking up the object, and as i looked back up it was gone. nowhere in the sky while the other two jets were flying away. the film i took was 2:47 minutes long, so i watched the object for about 2 minutes. it was completely visible the entire time as well as the two jets, but was gone after i looked back up. about 5 minutes later i'm walking down a street where you can see a nice horizon. i saw a bright light over the horizon and i stood in the middle of the street to watch it. it went upwards into the sky and disappeared into the clouds. i already had called my brother about the first ufo, so i didn't even bother tell him about the second one. i'm tired of seeing stuff and not getting it on film. 


note: also in the video i have the 2 jets and an airplane flying across the sky as well that i was comparing this object to. the way i judge my ufo sightings is this. anything normal in the sky is boring. anything that's not boring to me is a ufo. this was brighter than the jets (the sun was reflecting off the jets) and it was abnormal. 


i also still haven't figured out what this object is i witnessed with 2 other people. no noise and it was very low but had 4 lights and had flares shooting upwards out of the top of it every couple of seconds. we watched it for about half a minute. i wokeup the next morning searching the news for a plane crash, but nothing in the news. i never figured out what that was.
content.summary: Lights in the skies in winston

content.detailedDescription: I was ten years old when i first saw the lights in phoenix night sky and my two mothers who by the way are a lesbian couple were asleep in their bedroom because it was bedtime. anyway, i chosed to secretly stay up and see the night sky while my two female parents and my three older sisters were sleeping in their beds. suddenly i saw a strange form of reddish or orange lights in the night sky, so i secretly tip-toed from my bedroom and slowly walked downstairs to the living room to get a better view of the lights in the night sky. suddenly, i saw that the lights were part of a v-shaped object hovering over phoenix. at first i was scare, but then i became amazed at the object in the night sky because it made me belief that we're not alone in this universe. but sadly both the lights and the object itself disappeared and i went back to bed.
content.summary: It was v-shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends place having some drinks and we moved out onto the patio to smoke.I was sitting in the chair talking when i noticed a orange light peak over a distant neighbors house. our first thought was a lantern and then we thought maybe it was just a plane so we just watched it float across the sky and as it neared the clouds it just vanished. it looked like a small flashing orange dot. well we laughed it over and carried on and about 5 minutes later another one appeared from the same spot and went the same direction as the last. this time we decided to take pictures and i zoomed in and tried to use flash but it turned out looking like a white orb so i turned the flash off and captured the picture i have now.
content.summary: Saw orange light and watched it dissappear when it reached clouds and then minutes later saw 1 more

content.detailedDescription: There were several orb light close together and some stayed together while a few of them went off on there own, they would disappear and then end back up where we first saw them. no noice, a little windy out, very high cloud cover. used a canon sx160 is 16x to take some pictures. i had to have on highest zoom to capture one on site. i have them made a pdf so i could zoom it in. looks like a craft of some sort.
content.summary: Several orbs with photo

content.detailedDescription: Family dog had to go out back at 10.50 pm plus or minus a couple of minutes. had my 5 million candle power light with me when taking her out at night due to coyotes and bobcats. shined my light around the back yard as i always do and once i was looking in the northeast direction i noticed almost right away (3) craft with (4)large bright orange/ reddish lights each,traveling from the northeast, traveling directly over my back yard heading southwest towards phoenix. thought, in the first couple of seconds, that the lights were a type of aircraft, but realized quickly that these were not our aircraft. the (3) craft were in loose formation, not exactly a perfect triangle, but close together. each craft, on the underbelly, had (4) bright orange/red glowing lights forming a square about the size of a (2) car garage.Estimated these craft to be at about 1500 feet to 2500 feet above ground level. as they traveled directly over my back yard i noted that there was no noise from a propulsion system, completely silent. crafts were moving faster than a balloon or blimp but much slower than a plane and were in a controlled flight pattern. went back inside home and pulled wife out of bed. when she saw them she asked what they were. i commented that they were unidentified flying objects. she told me to get my camera and get some pictures. ran in and got my camera. took quite a few pictures and pictures do show orange/red glow. one of the (3) crafts sprinted ahead of the other two crafts and turned off its lights when it got close to phoenix. pictures that i took show (2) orange/red glowing orbs. after approximately 6 minutes the last two crafts were so far to the south west that we couldn't see the lights anymore. my wife is my witness and the pictures that i have show (2) glowing orange/red orbs.Both, my wife and i were amazed by the sight of these objects and had a hard time believing what we had seen. but did get it on my camera. not good enough to show any detail but does show (2) glowing orbs.
content.summary: 3 craft traveling slow over my back yard. lights (4) on the underbelly orange/red. both me and my wife saw them.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in car at the beach.  heard loud jet noise approaching.  got out of car to see.  loud mitary jet going sout to mout about 5oo ft high and 1/2 mile out from coast.  saw white orb or spere in front of jet.  it seemed to be chasing the light.  clear night, no fog as i thought the light might be a headlight from the jet??  pretty sure jet was chasing light though.
content.summary: Parked at beach, heard loud jet noise.  got of car and saw military jet chasing white orb.  very loud jet noise

content.detailedDescription: My mother lives in florida, and she called me shortly after veterans day and told me she believes she is repeatedly seeing a ufo, that appears every night in her back yard.  i decided to fly down to her and see it for myself, and sure enough without warning i too saw a huge bright white circular light appear across her lawn that shined directly on the house across from her.  i also noticed to other smaller lights about 200 feet before the house.  it appears for 7-10 seconds and then a shadow appears and it's gone.  again there is absolutely no noise and it is nothing i have ever seen before, it's very scary and my feeling was that it was not natural.  the good news is that if you choose to investigate this, you will get a chance to see it for yourselves because its very consistent and appears nightly between 10-11:00pm.
content.summary: A large white light appears almost every night w no noise in the same hour and without noise dissaprears. it constantly comes w out fail at almost the same time nightly.

content.detailedDescription: Was bored one afternoon got on the computer and opened g-e. after it opened i just picked a spot at random. i zoomed in and found an area that looked like a globe. g-e has the option to look at previous years of photos. when i looked at past photos it made this area a bit more strange. to me it looks like it could be a u.S.O or u.F.O base. you decide.
content.summary: Got on g-e picked a spot at random zoomed in and found this interesting structure.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to go running with my dog and my mom. we were no more than 2 blocks past my house, crossing the road when i turned back and saw a group of red lights floating in the sky. i told my mom and we stood for a couple seconds wondering what they were. i've previously seen fire looking lights in january 2013, to find out numerous people in different states saw the same thing. so it couldn't have been an isolated incident.

to continue with this encounter, we have a bunch of palms and trees that distracted me from seeing them clearly. they seemed like they were flying in from the direction over some apartment buildings a good distance away, not very close. i couldn't find a source of where they were directly coming from though, there's nothing really over there that it would be an event, but i can't be sure. they just seemed to come from nowhere. there had to be at least a dozen, if not more floating and moving over the nearby baseball field, past my house and then appeared to slow or stop, then fizzle out.

they did not look remotely close to a lantern appearance, they reminded me of a jacks toy you play with the ball to see how many jacks you can get before the ball comes down.

as we continued walking maybe 4 blocks away, they kept coming, but from another direction, maybe 2 or 3 at most. then they stayed put and fizzled out.

this stuff always happens when i don't have a digital camera on me. i don't think it was some lanterns in the skies, but i sure hope it was some miss-identification.
content.summary: Red star-like lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were in the way home when he pointed out somethin in the sky so i pulled out my phone and started to film what i could see
content.summary: I saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Above the estrella mountains in sw phoenix. i watched close to 15 objects coming up from behind the mountains. they were all the same size. they went up instead of across the sky like planes. the objects pulsated from red to white. there was no sound. they kept on a specific track with very little variation. around 1500-2500 feet they hovered. i watched for about 4 minutes and then ran inside to get my phone to video. when i came back 3 remained. i video taped them for 1:50 minutes until they all disappeared. they were grouped in 3's. and would go up hover and then go into the cloud bank and disappear.  my whole life i have truly believed we could not possibly be alone in this universe, but last night i was granted the privilege of watching what i believe to be actual evidence of extra terrestrial crafts.
what i watched was nothing like i have witnessed before. i am in the flight path of luke air force base. i watch and hear all different kinds of planes and helicopters on a daily basis and i can tell you this was the most spectacular aerial show i have ever seen.
content.summary: Up to 15 objects ascending in uniform going straight up then hovering for a few minutes. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: Dog out 2:10 am west orange county fl sw over the gulf took path of descent at 2:40 thought was aircraft at first it stayed in one position for 28 min then descent out of our sitebelow roof tops in 2 min woke up husband grandson and son to see it when it.

content.detailedDescription: I cannot write all this but i promise you if someone calls me it it's definitely not a wasted of time. my roommate can verify several occurrences as well. you will find all those very interesting, and scary.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Terrifying, this has happened on several occasions.My roommate has had experiences.I've tried to contact other agencies to help

content.detailedDescription: Laying in my bed i looked up to the window. i noticed a slow moving very bright object that was not there 30 minutes prior when i last looked out. i texted my brother right away to confirm whether this could be a ufo. he called me and we tracked it together over the phone. he lives in halton hills and could see it from there too in the distance and  we confirmed the same movements.He had friends with him who also confirmed seeing it. it alternated between hovering then moved left, right and zigzaged between the two, but always going towards the west (other than the stationary hovering portions). i noticed it at 1130 in laying position, within another 3o minutes i had to get up from bed to see it as it kept moving towards the west. its now 1245 and i can still see it although it will soon be above my house and it ill not be visible unitl (and if) it moves far enough west i can see it from another window in my house.
content.summary: Noticed a slow moving very bright object. tracked it with my brother on the phone who lives in georgetown ontario. confirmed same movements. hovering then left, right zigzags but always going towards the west.

content.detailedDescription:
my 12 year old son and myself arrived home in palo alto at about 8:23pm after a picking up fast food. as we backed in to our driveway i looked up and saw a light in the sky that looked to be in a similar flight path as normal commercial aircraft. but i instantly noticed that it emitted a very strange orange color and not the normal colors of the other aircraft in the vicinity. also there was no strobe light or any of the other kinds of lights that i usually see on aircraft. 
 i watched the object for a few seconds as it was traveling under the cloud cover and then i grabbed my pair of binoculars and observed what appeared to be a sphere being lighted from underneath by an orange slightly pulsating light. being night time though it was hard to establish with any certainty the shape in addition to the fact that it went through the cloud cover. though i watched for several more minutes i did not see it again. the flight path of the object was not much different than any other aircraft but it made no sound that neither my son or i could hear. when i looked at the other aircraft that were in the area at the same time, it was obvious that those were aircraft and we could hear the sound coming from all those aircraft.
also, when we first spotted the craft it was approximately south and moved in a northerly direction. as it entered the cloud cover it was approximately east by north east. the time it took the object to move that distance made it seem to moving about the same speed as the commercial jets. it did not behave as a balloon would.
 i am an amateur astronomer and also spent several years working on jet aircraft in the us air force. i have also seen many different balloons in the sky including hot air balloons. it was none of those. if the strange colored light had not caught my attention i probably would have ignored it.
content.summary: Orange yellow light in flight path under clouds with other commercial jet aircraft in the area. after about 4 minutes went through low layer of clouds and was not seen again

content.detailedDescription: Craft over morrison, co approximately .25 mile above hogbacks about the size of a car with red lights flashing sequentially. observed at around 8pm feb 15 for only 3 minutes as i was driving; landed into the hogback just west of c-470 and the north side of belleview. the second it hit the hogback it disappeared. as i've stated above it was the size of a car and hovered like a helicopter which had lights similar to a jet.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown craft over morrison, co

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:55 at night when i was watching t.V., i observed a glowing orange orb ascend to around 2-300 ft into the air from where i was sitting. i know that this was by a cell tower and an electrical substation (very small. after hovering for about 30-45 secs, it headed east at a very slow speed, towards cocoa beach. after seeing this object, i had ran outback to get a better view. once it started taking off, i had to run threw the house to get out front to run up the street to keep watching what it was doing. i got to track it for a few more seconds before it left from my view.
following points.
1.At my house watching t.V.
2. i saw something moving outside my window in the air that made me automatically look because the strangeness of it.
3.U.F.O.......
4.It was a glowing orange orb, to which i can only say was about 4 times the size of them yoga balls. i observed it ascend to about 2-300 ft. into the air, and stay stationary for a brief moment, then very slowly headed east of me, to where merritt island and cocoa beach are. it is only about a 10 min drive to the beach from me. it stayed to its same pace and direction until i lost sight of it.
5. as soon as i saw it i knew it was a u.F.O. i took in everything reasonable and dismissed them very quickly because that was easy to do considering what it was doing i.E., (hovering, slow flight w/o falling like a rock, no noise, ect.) i am still in the very exited and mystified emotions of seeing one. i am a avid fan of shows like ancient aliens, and fully believe that biengs other than us humans exist. and to see something like this satisfies me. i see alot of planes and helicopters out of my window daily especially because the way my window is made. as soon as i seen this object it stunned me, and knew there was not much time. so i ran outback, and watched astoundingly. after it started moving i was loosing sight of it, so i ran threw the house out to the front to try to see it for a little longer to see if it was going to do anything differently. it wasn't but a few moments later, i could not see it anymore. 
6. i lost sight of it behind the sky line. 
i am entering this report to see if anyone else seen what i saw, and can inform me if and what happened after it left my line of sight.
i would also like to thank m.U.F.O.N. for it's hard work and dedication to this cause.
content.summary: Observed glowing orange orb ascend to around 2-300 ft into the air from where i was sitting. i know that this was by a cell tower and a electrical substation (very small). after hovering for about 30-45 secs, it headed east  towards  cocoa beach.

content.detailedDescription:
I only wrote this down 5 years after the event, so i hope i don't leave out too many details. i was playing a computer game at my friend's house and he was watching me when all of the sudden he got really excited and said he saw a shooting star. his house is on a hillside just above a flat area, so we had a good view of the sky and were just above eye level with the tree tops as we looked out his window. anyway, i was too into the game and figured it would be gone by the time i looked so i didn't. i thought he was too excited for just a shooting star anyway. then he kept seeing them and getting so excited that he finally wrenched me away from the screen to look. at first i was nothing, he said to wait, and then i saw a bright flash of light and i told him that it was definitely not a shooting star. the closest i can get to describing it is like the flash of light from an "artillery shell" firework, the ones that make the loudest bang and just emit a flash of light. looking for a logical reason i told him that it was just the neighbors lighting off fireworks, even though i didn't see the faint light as it shoots up that i usually see due to the wick burning. i was standing right next to the window and thought it was strange that i couldn't hear the noise from it, it was easily close enough to hear through a window, and i started to mention this to my friend when i looked down and realized the window was wide open but there was no noise to be heard beyond the usual forest sounds. that is when a creepy feeling came over me and all sorts of explanations went through my head, a weather balloon seemed like it might be able to do this. but then, after several seemingly random flashes with several seconds between them, the light flashed once more and then dimmed but did not go out entirely. it stayed dim and began to fall fairly fast, then it got brighter again and stopped a little ways above the tree line, at which point less than ten smaller reddish light separated from it and they all disappeared. we wondered over it for a little while but then kind of dismissed it and went back to playing computer, we were only 17 and 16 years old.
a few minutes later my friend stopped me again telling me to come look at the shooting stars. this time they actually did look like shooting stars, hundreds of then shooting around. my first thought was that it was a massive meteor shower but as i continued to watch i became convinced otherwise. first of all they were not appearing and disappearing like other shooting stars i had seen, they were constant lights, and secondly they were moving not only down and across the sky but also up, diagonally and every direction. they moved in fast-moving erratic paths, many changing directions in an instant. as i was trying to figure out what these lights were, my friend started telling me be could see actual objects moving around and reflecting the moonlight slightly. i have bad night vision but i could also see things moving when he pointed them out. we decided to go outside to get a better look at them, so we went and laid on the hill. my friend was seeing them much more clearly than me but then one of these crafts floated in front of the moon and there was no mistaking it this time. i didn't believe my eyes so i asked my friend what he was seeing in order to confirm what i was seeing and he told me he saw a triangular shaped black craft with smooth corners just as i was seeing. as i watched that thing silently glide overhead, i couldn't help but get a creepy feeling like someone was watching us. i had a hard time seeing them after that one was no longer between me and the moon, but i could still see the lights and we continued to watch them. then, slowly, clouds rolled in and the lights began to disappear behind then. about !5 minutes after they all had disappeared the clouds rolled away and the sky was clear in the moonlight as though nothing had ever happened. we were a bit unnerved by this but eventually went to sleep and woke up and fold his dad the next morning. then his dad told us about some other strange things like electrical interruptions that had been happening at their house but they could be completely unrelated. i would like to think that this was part of an experiment by the air force but the motions of the crafts suggest a much higher technology was being used than is available to us. they were all changing directions quickly, even 90 degrees, and without a sound. the sheer amount of them together without a crash suggests a level of skill that would not be attainable with our current technology. i have been wracking my brain for years and cannot come up with an explanation that doesn't involve advanced technology. if anyone has a logical explanation please let me know and do not assume that i believe in aliens.
content.summary: Bright cirle flashes several times, then descends. many starlike lights moving randomly. visibly saw triangular craft in contrast of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Objects were seen and recorded. were coming from fl everglades, and all traveling at same speed in straight line. all disappeared at same exact location. i have video of  incident.
content.summary: Over 50 lights at least. movement was some what rapid. all traveling at same speed. all seemed to disappear at same location.

content.detailedDescription: Huge glowing light at the end of our backyard. appears to have landed. powerful red-orange light. we were watching tv inside our home when we saw a reddish glow over the trees. we went outside, it was snowy but surprisingly warm. we approached the light because we wanted to know what it was. normally, there is no lights here and we don't have any street lamps on our street. i put my hand in my pocket and reached for my mobile phone. we (me, wife) were all nervous. our dog was barking at the light. we then all saw something moving beside the light, where it was at its brightest. i tried to take a video with the mobile phone but it got incredibly warm to touch. i pressed the button to snap a picture and the phone shut off. in a matter of seconds, the light ascended towards the sky and in about 5 seconds, it was totally dark outside. we don't know what it was but we are all terrified. we got home wondering what this could have been. when we got back inside, nobody talked, we were all wondering what this was. we looked at the phone and saw the picture of what seems to be a 4 or 5 foot tall entity directly in front of us. it was standing next to the red-orange light. please get back to us because this event scared us and we don't know what are their intentions. we heard about events occurring in another town in the area (sainte-brigitte de laval) and we don't want anything this weird happen to our family. thank you. d.C
content.summary: Glowing light in our woods and big headed entity photographed

content.detailedDescription:
The event happened in february 13, 2014, night time till next day morning when all the snow melted.

my husband and i were at home, close to bedtime, we were watching tv in the bedroom, suddenly there were electricity interruption for a few seconds. this worried us, because that early afternoon the whole area had power outage for a few hours, but the electric company already came and fixed it.

we were wondering about our cat because he was outside, my husband got up and went to the backyard and frontyard to call our cat to come home. that's when he discovered the snow crop circle. he yelled i have never seen anything like this and had the camera taking the pictures. there were no footprint in & out of the yard, the circle is almost perfectly round. i walked up take a closer look and took more pictures. it contains couple more circle within it.

the next day morning, my husband took more pictures when the snow had melted a little more. the rings of circle appear more clearly like showing multiple layer of the bottom of the ufo or the ufo was hovering close to the land and slowly landing on the yard that made that rings of circle imprinted on the snow. we really can't think anyone would have done it. the day was really cold and it's dangerous to go out. it was the second biggest snow storm we have in georgia, nobody go out and it was night time.
content.summary: Possible ufo made snow crop circle landing on the front yard with pictures
